description: If you need to convert pdf's to txt files (or other formats) then this app is great. Lots of other features too! Recommended.
summary: Great for pdf to text conversions

description: Collect e-documents by the hundreds and need to keep track of them? This long-serving tool just gets better and better. Never wonder where you put it again, just open Calibre. Great for readers AND researchers.

I've been using Calibre for many years now. I love it overall, but the editor part leaves something to be desired. The best ebook editor I've found so far, is Sigil. It's far more flexible, and will make an epub3 from scratch, which I don't believe Calibre is capable of (it wasn't, last time I checked). Still, for quick and dirty edits, the Calibre editor is just fine.
summary: It's OK, but Sigil is much better

description: I have used many tools to manage my libraries, convert file formats, and edit ebooks. Kovid Goyal's Calibre is the singularly robust tool to manage large (and small) libraries, and edit individual ebook files, available today. It's engineered as a cross-platform open-source toolkit that even an adept librarian could use and be happy with. Available for 32bit/64bit Linux, macOS and 32bit/64 bit Windows, you really can't go wrong utilizing this superb tool.
summary: Easily The Best Open-Source Cross-Platform eBook Manager Available

description: This version is seriously out of date. The current version is 5.39 and plugins are now requiring at least a 5.0 version
Create all my ebooks with it! You can edit teh css so you can read in all your devices! Great tool! And it's cross-plataform!

Leider startet sich der E-book Editor sehr häufig beim Aufruf von Links oder verlinkten Anleitungen (Kubunntu 20.04 LTS). Calibre kann die dann aber nicht darstellen und so können die Anleitungen nicht gelesen werden. Schade!
Logiciel permettant un vrai traail de fond, mais il faut s’y connaître un peu en codage html et css.

La version fournie avec Ubuntu-20.04 ne fonctionnait pas (crash du gestionnaire et pas de près visualisation avec l'éditeur). Je suis passé avec celui du site d'origine (en version 5.2)... Tout baigne !
summary: Logiciel génial que j'utilise depuis plusieurs années
